remarks: The set of all functions with the signature of a polynomial is a polynomially closed set.  This is a lemma to show that the intersection in ~ df-mzp is well-defined.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)
statement: mzpclall $p |- ( V e. _V -> ( ZZ ^m ( ZZ ^m V ) ) e. ( mzPolyCld ` V ) ) $.
